functionMessageArray.name: Connect Presentation Space

message.mes: An incorrect host presentation space ID was specified. The specified session either does not exist, or is a logical printer session
Successful connection was achieved, but the host presentation space is busy
Successful connection was achieved, but the host presentation space is locked (input unhibited).
A system error occured.
This resource is unavailable. The host presentation space is already being used by another system function

functionMessageArray.explaination: Errors on Connection Presentation Space are usually caused because hllapi-node either doesn't find your hllapi instance, or the presentation space you defined does not exist (this should be a char betwee 'A' and 'Z')

functionMessageArray.name: Disconnect Presentation Space

message.mes: Your program was not currently connected to the host presentation space.
A system error was encountered

functionMessageArray.explaination: You never connected to a presentation space. Check for error messages involving Connect Presentation Space. If there are none, you did remember to call it, right?

functionMessageArray.name: Send Key

message.mes: Your program was not currently connected to the host presentation space.
An incorrect parameter was passed to HLLAPI
The host session was busy; all of the keystrokes could not be sent.
Input to the target session was inhibited or rejected; all of the keystrokes could not be sent.
A system error was encountered.

functionMessageArray.explaination: You never connected to a presentation space. Check for error messages involving Connect Presentation Space. If there are none, you did remember to call it, right?

functionMessageArray.name: Wait

message.mes: Your program was not currently connected to the host presentation space.
Timeout while still in XCLOCK (X []) or XSYSTEM
The keyboard is locked
A system error was encountered.

functionMessageArray.explaination: You never connected to a presentation space. Check for error messages involving Connect Presentation Space. If there are none, you did remember to call it, right?

functionMessageArray.name: CopyPresentationSpace

message.mes: Your program was not currently connected to the host presentation space.
The host presentation space contents were copied. The connected host presentation space was waiting for a response.
The host presentation space was copied. The keyboard was locked.
A system error was encountered.

functionMessageArray.explaination: You never connected to a presentation space. Check for error messages involving Connect Presentation Space. If there are none, you did remember to call it, right?

The host presentation space position is not valid.

The search string was not found.

functionMessageArray.name: CopyPresentationSpaceToString

message.mes: Your program was not currently connected to the host presentation space.
An error was made in specifying string length, or the sum of (Length - 1) + PS Position is greater than the size of the connected host presentation space..

The host presentation space was copied. The keyboard was locked
The host presentation space position is not valid.
